channel.title: {class suggestion} The Poor Fellow and The Vengeful Fellow
channel.description:
_**Name - poor fellow **_ _**Faction - BD **_ _**Type - invest**_
**Passive 1** - dying breath - can only talk once per day and once per night. This includes whispers
**Day Ability 1** - second wind - you can say another sentence during the day this is used but the next day you can not speak at all. (Unlimited uses) (1 day cool down)
**Night ability 1** - show your pain - strangle someone causing them to only be allowed to say 1 sentence during the morning. (Unlimited uses)
**Night ability 2** - Good listener - listen in on a random conversation(prince,psychic,unseen,cult meeting). (Unlimited uses)
**Win condition** - eliminate anyone who opposes the BD
_**Name - Vengeful fellow **_ _**Faction - Unseen **_ _**Type - invest**_
**Passive 1** - dying breath - can only talk once per day and once per night. This doesn't include whispers
**Day Ability 1** - second wind - you can say another sentence during the day this is used but the next day you can not speak at all. (Unlimited uses) (1 day cool down)
**Night ability 1** - show your pain - strangle someone causing them to only be allowed to say 1 sentence during the morning. (Unlimited uses)
**Night ability 2** - Great listener - listen If anyone is trying to interrupt the meeting. Strangle everyone who visited you and your fellow teammates. Making them only allow to say 1 sentence (4 uses)
**Win condition** - eliminate anyone who opposes the unseen
**Notes**: If he joins the cult then he will kid his passive because the cult leader has healed you from your dying breath.

item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
The reason for that ability is to silence people that threaten to vote you up. This also changes the “repeat” meta when someone thinks of a trollbox. This class is mostly strong at gaining information though the night and knowing when to share it.

item.title: {class suggestion} The Poor Fellow and The Vengeful Fellow
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
This can barely speak. This makes it almost impossible to work with your team as BD, which is not very fun. Show your pain is basically chill, which is too powerful to be used every night, which will be done by the evil variety. Not too powerful for BD, since you are limiting information, which is bad for you.
